name: Colin McRae Rally 2005
summary: The mobile version of the console Colin McRae Rally 2005 game, the J2ME version contains tracks in 4 countries with 3 stages for each track. Damage taken can be repaired between stages, but you've got a limited amount of time you can spend in the service area each time so you may not be able to repair everything if you take too much damage. The game includes various modes of play (including an option to race against a ghost of a previous lap), and weather effects on some of the tracks.
